ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and heaven is opened and becomes doorways,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The heavens will be opened wide and turn into so many doors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and when the sky shall be opened up and will become all doors;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The heavens will have openings like doors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the heaven will be opened – it therefore becomes like gates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the heaven shall be opened, and it will become as gates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the heaven shall be opened so that it shall be all openings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and heaven is opened, and become gates,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the heaven is opened and becometh as gates,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the heaven shall be opened, and become gates,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the heaven will have been opened, and it will have become doors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the sky will be opened and become gates,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the heavens shall be opened as if there were doors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the heaven shall be opened, and it will become as gates,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and heaven is opened, having gates,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the sky is opened up, and becomes gateways.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:19] and the heaven is opened (read futtihat or futihat), sundered for the descent of the angels, and becomes as gates, it becomes [a heaven] with gates,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the heaven is opened) and the gates of heaven are opened (and becometh as gates) and becomes different roads,
